sentence.Network_en: He was brazenly running a $400,000-a-month drug operation from the prison.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在监狱里肆无忌惮地操纵着每月40万美元的毒品生意。

sentence.Network_en: The children were brazenly stripping off and leaping into the sea.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子们正无所顾忌地脱光衣服跳进海里。

sentence.Network_en: " I don't know, " he answered, looking her brazenly over.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我也不知道, " 他厚颜无耻地打量着她.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ... 明目张胆[ explicitly;brazenly;openly;flagrantly;be bold and unscrupulous] 新张[ (of a shop) start doing business].
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) ... brazenfaced 厚脸皮的 brazenly 厚脸皮地 brazier 火盆.
悍的意思,悍怎么读_在线字典 ... 悍妇〖 fierywoman;shrew〗 悍然〖 outrageously;brazenly〗 悍勇〖 brave;bold〗.

list.abs: someone's gender , their apparent willingness and even time elapsed since the favor was performed , can all change a selfless act into something brazenly transactional or vice versa .一个人的性别、他要求别人回报的意愿度，甚至这个人情已经过去了多长时间，这一切都能将一个无私的行动转化为某种厚脸皮的交易，反之亦然。
COWER畏缩，退缩v.brazenly confront 悍然面对PRISTINE纯净的，太古的adj.
But the pirates continue brazenly attack vulnerable vessels ., 但是海盗仍然肆无忌惮地攻击容易受到攻击的船只.
How dare he distort the facts so brazenly !, 他怎么敢如此肆无忌惮地歪曲事实!

entry.tran: 无所顾忌的；肆无忌惮的
entry.def: If you describe a person or their behaviour as brazen, you mean that they are very bold and do not care what other people think about them or their behaviour.

example.ex: They're quite brazen about their bisexuality, it doesn't worry them.
example.tran: 他们在自己的双性恋问题上无所顾忌，毫不为意。

auth_sentence.content: The British Government should stop the international oil companies brazenly flouting sanctions.
auth_sentence.res_content: The British Government should stop the international oil companies brazenly flouting sanctions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The British Government should stop the international oil companies brazenly flouting sanctions.

auth_sentence.content: Plagiarism is the worst of his crimes. He brazenly takes over the best known passages.
auth_sentence.res_content: Plagiarism is the worst of his crimes. He brazenly takes over the best known passages.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Plagiarism is the worst of his crimes. He brazenly takes over the best known passages.

sentences.en: How dare he distort the facts so brazenly!
sentences.cn: 他怎么敢如此肆无忌惮地歪曲事实！
